entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
